news.title: Alphabet stock pops 6% in premarket trading after Google avoids break-up in antitrust case
news.summary: Alphabet shares rose 6% in premarket trading on Wednesday. Investors viewed the result of Google's antitrust case as broadly favorable. Google's stock is up 6% this morning.

news.title: Walmart-backed fintech OnePay is adding wireless plans to its everything app
news.summary: The OnePay launch is the latest example of a fintech firm adding wireless connectivity to its product set. Klarna and Nubank have made similar announcements.

news.title: Macy's shares pop 10% as retailer tops earnings estimates, raises outlook
news.summary: Macy's easily beat Wall Street's earnings estimates and raised its guidance. The company said revamped stores saw better sales trends. Macy's also said it was seeing a boost in sales at its online stores.

news.title: Translation startup DeepL launches an AI 'agent' in challenge to players like OpenAI
news.summary: DeepL launched the AI DeepL Agent on Wednesday aimed at enterprises. The company is pitting it against companies like Microsoft and Anthropic.

news.title: 30-year Treasury yield tops 5% briefly as traders deal with tariff uncertainty, Fed independence threat
news.summary: U.S. Treasurys were little changed on Wednesday, but long-dated bonds hovered just below the 5% mark.

news.title: Dollar Tree says higher-income customers are still driving its growth. But the stock is tumbling.
news.summary: Dollar Tree gave a downbeat outlook for the current quarter, despite raising its full-year outlook. Off-price retailer Dollar Tree raised its full year outlook.

news.title: Campbell’s tops earnings forecast as cost-conscious consumers continue to cook at home
news.summary: Campbell’s stock rallies as the continued consumer trend of cooking from home helped fuel a profit beat. The company reported a quarterly profit of $1.2 billion.

news.title: 14 stocks of companies that could benefit from Trump’s state capitalism
news.summary: Companies that already receive a lot of federal money might wind up having even closer ties to the government. Companies that already get federal money may wind up with even closer links to theGovernment.

news.title: It’s time to face the ugly truth: American consumers have been gloomy for quite some time
news.summary: One day we have swagger, the next day we're cautious. Suddenly we're thrifty again. One day, we're swaggering. The next day,We're cautious again.

news.title: Macy’s stock rises after same-store sales see first growth since 2022
news.summary: Sales rise at the 125 stores in Macy’s reimagine network, as well as Bluemercury and Bloomingdale's locations.
